patthana21.47:1.1_0: Nasāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.47:2.1_0: Naanāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.47:3.1_0: (Nasāsavaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighamūlassa purimanayena tīṇi pañhā.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.47:4.1_0: Naanāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
